scripts.all: npm run webpack && npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.package: cd dist && aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file serverless.yaml --s3-bucket smartattendance-lambda --profile smartattendance
scripts.deploy: cd dist && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file serverless.yaml --stack-name smartattendance-test --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile smartattendance
